thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com | 3 of 10
thread.title: Mara

author: Mara
title: Mara
text:
This was my first "under-the-sky" experience.
I absolutely loved it but, without tent, I wouldn't do it again.
We had no problems at all but for me it is a matter of "feeling protected".
Our guide was Jodie, who I absolutely recommend. With her you feel safe. She is proposive, explosive, dynamic, strong and knows always how to interact with people.
The trip was very well organised and we were lucky that all partecipants harmonized immediately.
We saw all sorts of animals, a night sky you can't immagine, made interesting hikes up the mountains and into gorges, swam with sea lions and dolphins, took walks on white beaches and and and
Amazing!!!
